description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=0/3. One of the longest running comics in history by a single artist.  Celebrating 20 years in publication and still counting, Gold Digger by Fred Perry is a unique blend of humor, adventure, and science.  Now you will be able to experience the first 7 issues of the action paced color series on you XBOX 360.
